mapper.select: select schedule_no, FK_EMPLOYEENO, schedule_title, schedule_content, TO_CHAR(schedule_start, 'yyyy-mm-dd"T"hh24:mi:ss') as schedule_start, TO_CHAR(schedule_end, 'yyyy-mm-dd"T"hh24:mi:ss') as schedule_end, schedule_color, schedule_importance, schedule_progresStat, schedule_allday, schedule_authority, schedule_type from TBL_BO_SCHEDULE where schedule_type = 0 and fk_employeeno = 2
mapper.insert: insert into TBL_BO_SCHEDULE(schedule_no, FK_EMPLOYEENO, schedule_title, schedule_content, schedule_start, schedule_end, schedule_color, schedule_importance, schedule_progresStat, schedule_allday, schedule_authority, schedule_type) values(SEQ_BO_SCHEDULE.nextval, #{fk_employeeno}, #{schedule_title}, #{schedule_content}, to_date(#{schedule_start},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), to_date(#{schedule_end}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #{schedule_color}, 0, 0, #{schedule_allday}, 0, #{schedule_type})
